content.text: 0) Measure flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and chocolate chips into a large bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Measure"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@18:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "baking powder"@25:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@40:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "chocolate chips"@50:65 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@71:83 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Mix thoroughly, and make a well in the center.
2) Beat the egg in a small bowl until frothy.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the egg"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a small bowl"@19:31 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until frothy"@32:44 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Mix in cooking oil, milk, and bananas.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "cooking oil"@10:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "milk"@23:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "bananas"@33:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Fill"@3:7 / AC
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "greased muffin cups"@8:27 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "3/4 full"@28:36 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "20 to 25 minutes"@45:61 / DUR )
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "400 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-7-1 "205 degrees C"@26:39 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
